quote: The part you don't expect when you start out is all the people who come into your life wanting a piece of you, not caring about your wellbeing. The insane schedule is very difficult. When you're recording in the midst of touring, you get a different sense about you. Things are more rocking, darker, heavier and louder. You're thinking about the audience that you're seeing every night.

I love touring. I can't wait. Everything is just normal when you're finally on tour. I think, for me, it's my happiest thing; I love moving around, and I have friends and family all over the place. It's kind of my time. It's almost like home. It's when I get to see everybody.
'Loveless' was a really big record for me. It was what was keeping me alive when I was still touring with Redd Kross.
I didn't finish high school. I tried to as an adult, but with all this touring, I had to quit.
I find it hard to get enthusiastic about hotels because, as a touring comic, I spend a lot of time in them.
